channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: There’s Never Been a Worse Time to Be Authentic at Work
item.description: Workers have been told to bring themselves to work, only to be disappointed time and time again, argues author Jodi-Ann Burey in her new book.

item.title: Last chance alert: Founder and Investor Bundle savings for TechCrunch Disrupt 2025 ends tomorrow
item.description: Founder and Investor Bundle savings for TechCrunch Disrupt 2025 end tomorrow, October 3. Groups of 4–9 founders save 15% and investors save 20%. Acces...

item.title: Perplexity acquires the team behind Sequioa-backed AI design startup Visual Electric
item.description: Perplexity has acquired Visual Electric, an AI Design tool. Its team is going to lead a new agents experience group at Perplexity

item.title: The Trump Administration Is Coming for Nonprofits. They're Getting Ready
item.description: As the Trump administration threatens them, liberal nonprofits have been quietly preparing to do everything from surrendering 501(c)(3) status to relo...

item.title: Spacecoin beams blockchain transaction through space in bid for decentralized internet
item.description: Spacecoin envisions a decentralized rival to SpaceX's Starlink.

item.title: OpenAI is the world’s most valuable private company after private stock sale
item.description: OpenAI employees sold $6.6B in shares, leading company's valuation to jump to $500B.

item.title: The Best USB-C Cables (2025): For iPhones, Android Phones, Tablets, and Laptops
item.description: Unravel the tangled world of cords and find the ones you need to charge your gadgets and transfer data.

item.title: Apple shelves Vision Pro overhaul to focus on AI glasses
item.description: Bloomberg reports that the tech giant is developing at least two types of smart glasses.

item.title: Former Google CEO Will Fund Boat Drones to Explore Rough Antarctic Waters
item.description: Scientists have a lot of questions about our planet’s most important carbon sink—and a new project could help answer them.

item.title: 13 Best Carry-On Luggage (2025): Away, Travelpro, and More
item.description: Whether you need a roller bag for a work trip or a tote for a bachelorette, we tested the best bags to bring on a plane.
